page.syntax: Result_Flag as L = UI_DLG_CTL_GOTO(C title,C control)

argument.name: Result_Flag
argument.description:
Indicates whether the function succeeded.
.T. = Success
.F. = Failure

argument.name: title
argument.description: The name of the dialog box.

page.description: Goto a control in the open dialog, return TRUE if succeeded.
page.discussion: The UI_DLG_CTL_GOTO() function sets focus to a control in a dialog. Limitations: Desktop applications only.

section.title: Example
section.description: This example captures the setfocus event of F2 and returns the cursor to F1.
This example sets the tabbing order of fields on a dialog.
